name: CSCI5828 Spiral Model
tagline: Repo for CSCI 5828 Fall 2015 Presentation on the Spiral Model SDLC
body:
### The Spiral Model. This is the first presentation for CSCI 5828 [Fall 2015](http://www.cs.colorado.edu/~kena/classes/5828/f15/assignments/presentations.html), all about the Spiral Model for software development. ### Table of Contents
  1. History
  2. Activities/Phases
  3. Advantages
  4. Disadvantages
  5. Conclusion
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
